Crimes.Legal_Issue: Classification of Tamil males who traveled on the MV Sun Sea as a 'particular social group' under s. 96 of IRPA
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA), section 96
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review following RPD's grant of refugee protection
Evidence_Type: Historical event of traveling on MV Sun Sea
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Perceived affiliation with LTTE due to travel on MV Sun Sea
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied in judicial review
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of link between group membership and discrimination or human rights
Crimes.Application_Error: Classifying a group based solely on voluntary association without connection to discrimination
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision remanded for reconsideration by a different panel
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Absence of evidence connecting group identity to systemic discrimination
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Particular social group must relate to discrimination, human rights, or human dignity
Crimes.Application_Factor: Focus on historical event rather than protected grounds
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether classification as particular social group meets legal threshold
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to establish protected ground under s. 96
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence linking group identity to persecution risk
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Proper process followed but error in law occurred
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimant argued inclusion in particular social group due to perceived LTTE ties
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Error in legal characterization of social group
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to connect group membership to human rights concerns

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration and refugee status determination involving organized smuggling
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issue: No procedural unfairness identified, but legal error found
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Association based on shared journey via MV Sun Sea
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issue: Lack of evidence linking travel to persecution or discrimination
Crimes.Procedural_Requirement: Proper referral to RPD and right to appeal
Crimes.Risk_Nexus: Perceived risk due to association with LTTE through migration route
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Particular social group must have basis in discrimination or human rights
Crimes.Evidence_Source: Testimony and documentation related to voyage on MV Sun Sea
Crimes.Basis_for_Decision: Improper classification of group based on voluntary travel
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Denial: Potential security concerns due to perceived LTTE links
Crimes.Accusation: Being part of an organized migrant smuggling event
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Misapplication of legal test for particular social group
Crimes.Risk_Persecution: Alleged fear of persecution due to assumed LTTE affiliation
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether group formed by smuggling constitutes a particular social group

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee claim based on perceived membership in banned organization
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether perceived association with LTTE qualifies under 'particular social group'
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, section 96
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient linkage between travel and actual or perceived LTTE ties
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On claimant to demonstrate risk based on protected ground
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Claimant’s explanation of reasons for travel not tied to political activity
Crimes.Legal_Rule: A particular social group must be based on immutable characteristics or core human rights issues
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Error in law by RPD in defining social group
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution due to assumed LTTE affiliation from traveling on MV Sun Sea
Crimes.Outcome_on_Merits: Claim failed due to incorrect legal foundation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Process was fair but outcome legally flawed
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Fact of travel on MV Sun Sea, lack of individualized evidence of targeting
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Seeking recognition as member of particular social group
Crimes.Legal_Rule_Source: Section 96, IRPA; jurisprudence on particular social groups
Crimes.Remedy_Sought: Judicial review and setting aside of decision
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Perceived support for or association with LTTE
